ygData.subject: Diamond Dust Location Revealed
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings All! Well, if you liked the pictures recently posted to the compendium, how about a location?  That s right, Derkal Pentolite has revealed his source
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings All!

Well, if you liked the pictures recently posted to the compendium, how
about a location? That's right, Derkal Pentolite has revealed his source
of Diamond Dust to the Tinkering Community! Drop by the compendium for
the information.

I now expect all able Gnomes to go forth and confirm this location. Think
of it as a project for the weekend. If you do confirm it, please write
in so I may post it for all other Gnomes to see. Heck, be the first Gnome
to send in a picture with the dust in your inventory, and I'll post it to
the compendium too.

Thanks!
Fulcrum of Fennin Ro
Ak'Anon's Engineering Emissary
Custodian of Fulcrum's Tinkering Compendium
http://www.geocities.com/eqtinker
